short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The old windows minesweeper game for fun. You need to open all cells that doesn't contain a mine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The old windows minesweeper game for fun. You need to open all cells that doesn't contain a mine. You can use the left mouse button to open a cell and right mouse button to mark it as a bomb suspect. The number revealed is showing you how many mines are there in the surrounding cells. To start/restart the game just click on the extension icon.
